elements.title: Epipterygium opararense (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that all known populations of Epipterygium opararense (example pictured) live within a 5-metre (16 ft) radius in New Zealand?

elements.title: Gareth Knight (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Gareth Knight, a devout Christian, was an occultist who ran an esoteric society of magicians?

elements.title: Star Raiders (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1983 readers of the magazine Softline voted Star Raiders the best program for Atari computers?

elements.title: Mar Galcerán (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mar Galcerán is believed to be the first politician with Down syndrome to serve in a European regional parliament?

elements.title: 1976 Big Thompson River flood (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 1976 Big Thompson River flood took place several hours before Colorado's 100th anniversary of statehood?

elements.title: Lewis OfMan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that before discovering a rudimentary audio workstation on his mother's phone, the French musician Lewis OfMan wanted to be a perfumer?

elements.title: Harpegnathos alperti (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Harpegnathos alperti worker ants have black heads and chocolate-colored mandibles?

elements.title: Ethiopic Apocalypse of Ezra (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the reign of Ye will be one of perjury, slavery, pestilence and death, according to the Ethiopic Apocalypse of Ezra?
